heroTagline: I build scalable systems, integrate complex platforms, and turn ideas into high-performance solutions.
heroImageAlt: Leandro Rodrigues smiling in a green shirt
skillsFullStackDesc: Solid experience in back-end with Java, Spring Boot and Grails, as well as mastery of modern front-end. Developed systems from scratch with a focus on performance, scalability and integration with complex APIs.
skillsIndustryDesc: Led automation projects with Kubernetes clusters, Docker Swarm and Kafka integration. Created and maintained orchestrators that compete with market solutions such as Control-M, adopted in public and critical environments.
skillsStrategyDesc: Ability to connect business demands to technology. Structures modular and efficient architectures, promoting high availability, security and constant evolution of systems — always with a technical and strategic focus.
workSectionDesc: Take a look below at some of my featured work for clients from the past few years.
workPageDesc: Explore Leandro Rodrigues' portfolio showcasing his expertise in building scalable systems, integrating complex platforms, and crafting high-performance solutions across diverse industries.
workPageTagline: See my most recent projects below to get an idea of my past experience.
stacksSectionDesc: I have experience working with various technologies and frameworks. Below are some of the key stacks I've worked with.
aboutTagline: Thanks for stopping by. Read below to learn more about myself and my background.
aboutBackgroundP1: I'm Leandro Rodrigues, a Senior Full Stack Developer with over 5 years of experience turning complex problems into scalable, efficient, and impactful digital solutions. My journey has taken me through mission-critical systems, process automation platforms, and cloud-native architectures — all built with clean code and strategic vision.
aboutBackgroundP2: With strong expertise in Java, Spring Boot, Quarkus, C#, and front-end technologies like Vue.js, React.js and TypeScript, I design modular microservices and robust APIs. My focus lies not just in coding, but in building high-performance ecosystems. I'm also deeply familiar with containerized environments using Docker, Kubernetes, and OpenShift, and I often work with messaging tools like Kafka and RabbitMQ for system integration.
aboutBackgroundP3: Throughout my career, I've improved system scalability by over 40% through efficient microservice design, automated 15+ CI/CD pipelines, accelerated software delivery by 25%, developed 50+ custom plugins for SAP and enterprise tools, and migrated legacy systems to modern, highly available infrastructure with 99.9% uptime. I thrive on building solutions that simply work — and scale.
aboutEducationP2: Postgraduate MBA in Software Engineering (USP - in progress)
aboutEducationP3: Certifications: Docker for Beginners, Spring Framework, Agile Methodologies, AWS Educate
aboutSkillsP1: Java, Spring Boot, Quarkus, Grails, C#, ASP.NET, Python, Vue.js, TypeScript
aboutSkillsP3: Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift, CI/CD, Azure DevOps
aboutSkillsP4: Kafka, RabbitMQ, RESTful APIs, Microservices Architecture
